<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Total number of connected entities</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/insights/v3.0/resource/query/mobileusers/connected_entity_count"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the total number of users and devices connected to the GlobalProtect Gateway. 
The count will also include users and devices monitored by the ADEM Agent if an ADEM or DEM license is present.


## Request
